review.title: “My 20 yrs. with them had been wonderful”
review.pros: Pros – very professional and efficient management, helping nature
review.cons: Cons – This fleet has mostly old ships.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – keep it up, rotate personnel for better availibilty of experienced staff

review.title: “one of the worlds largest shipping company .... with lots of growth opportunity”
review.pros: Pros – its one of the worlds largest company so lots of ships and less waiting period , good salaries and always on time, lots of facilities available on board for there employs , and this company is known for having best policies for the benefit of there employs....
review.cons: Cons – most of the ships are old so lots of work for engineers , rest we can not grumble about the problems like hard life onboard and no social life etc . because this is a reality of merchant navy and are same in any company of the world ... " but in return good compensation for going through hard time"
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
